events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not as described and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
Assigning the case to the refunds department to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent order. I'd be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so we can process your request quickly?
My order number is 123456789. The product was completely different from the description, and it does not work as advertised.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund.
The refund process has been completed on our side. Please check your account in a few days to confirm receipt.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us if you have any further questions or concerns.
